article:
Tom is a   _  who lives in New York. His owners   _  him from a young age to find his toys. When they say the name of a certain toy, Tom can find it. In fact, he seems to know the    _   of 200 toys!
Some researchers in USA wanted to   _   Tom. They put his toys in a room and then told him to go into the room and find a certain toy.   _  nobody was in the room with Tom, he had no   _  from anyone finding the right toy. The researchers did this forty times. Tom found the right toy thirty-seven times.
Then the researchers   _  something else. They put seven of his toys in the room and one   _  
toy that Tom had never seen before. Then they told him to go into the room and get it, which had a name Tom had   _  heard before. He found the right toy seven out of ten times!
From this experiment, animal researchers know one thing for   _  . Tom has given them a lot to think about.
